mapper.insert: insert into tb_k3_sal_outstock ( fid, fbilltypeid, fbillno, fdate, fcustomerid, fstockorgid, fdeliverydeptid, fstockergroupid, fstockerid, freceiverid, fsettleid, fpayerid, fsaleorgid, fsaledeptid, fsalesgroupid, fsalesmanid, fdeliverybill, ftakedeliverybill, fcarrierid, fcarriageno, fdocumentstatus, fnote, fcreatorid, fcreatedate, fmodifierid, fmodifydate, fapproverid, fapprovedate, fcancelstatus, fcancellerid, fcanceldate, fownertypeid, fownerid, fheadlocid, fheadlocaddress, fheadlocationid, fbusinesstype, freceiveaddress, fcreditcheckresult, fobjecttypeid, ftransferbiztype, fcorrespondorgid, freccontactid, fisinterlegalperson, fplanrecaddress, fistotalserviceorcost, tc_define_rowid, tc_erp_code, tc_erp_add_time, tc_sync_status, tc_sync_msg, tc_sync_save_time, tc_sync_submit_time, tc_sync_audit_time) values ( #{fid}, #{fbilltypeid}, #{fbillno}, #{fdate}, #{fcustomerid}, #{fstockorgid}, #{fdeliverydeptid}, #{fstockergroupid}, #{fstockerid}, #{freceiverid}, #{fsettleid}, #{fpayerid}, #{fsaleorgid}, #{fsaledeptid}, #{fsalesgroupid}, #{fsalesmanid}, #{fdeliverybill}, #{ftakedeliverybill}, #{fcarrierid}, #{fcarriageno}, #{fdocumentstatus}, #{fnote}, #{fcreatorid}, #{fcreatedate}, #{fmodifierid}, #{fmodifydate}, #{fapproverid}, #{fapprovedate}, #{fcancelstatus}, #{fcancellerid}, #{fcanceldate}, #{fownertypeid}, #{fownerid}, #{fheadlocid}, #{fheadlocaddress}, #{fheadlocationid}, #{fbusinesstype}, #{freceiveaddress}, #{fcreditcheckresult}, #{fobjecttypeid}, #{ftransferbiztype}, #{fcorrespondorgid}, #{freccontactid}, #{fisinterlegalperson}, #{fplanrecaddress}, #{fistotalserviceorcost}, #{tcDefineRowid}, #{tcErpCode}, #{tcErpAddTime}, #{tcSyncStatus}, #{tcSyncMsg}, #{tcSyncSaveTime}, #{tcSyncSubmitTime}, #{tcSyncAuditTime})
mapper.update: update tb_k3_sal_outstock set fid = #{fid}, fbillno = #{fbillno}, fdate = #{fdate}, fcustomerid = #{fcustomerid}, fstockorgid = #{fstockorgid}, fdeliverydeptid = #{fdeliverydeptid}, fstockergroupid = #{fstockergroupid}, fstockerid = #{fstockerid}, freceiverid = #{freceiverid}, fsettleid = #{fsettleid}, fpayerid = #{fpayerid}, fsaleorgid = #{fsaleorgid}, fsaledeptid = #{fsaledeptid}, fsalesgroupid = #{fsalesgroupid}, fsalesmanid = #{fsalesmanid}, fdeliverybill = #{fdeliverybill}, ftakedeliverybill = #{ftakedeliverybill}, fcarrierid = #{fcarrierid}, fcarriageno = #{fcarriageno}, fdocumentstatus = #{fdocumentstatus}, fnote = #{fnote}, fcreatorid = #{fcreatorid}, fcreatedate = #{fcreatedate}, fmodifierid = #{fmodifierid}, fmodifydate = #{fmodifydate}, fapproverid = #{fapproverid}, fapprovedate = #{fapprovedate}, fcancelstatus = #{fcancelstatus}, fcancellerid = #{fcancellerid}, fcanceldate = #{fcanceldate}, fownertypeid = #{fownertypeid}, fownerid = #{fownerid}, fheadlocid = #{fheadlocid}, fheadlocaddress = #{fheadlocaddress}, fheadlocationid = #{fheadlocationid}, fbusinesstype = #{fbusinesstype}, freceiveaddress = #{freceiveaddress}, fcreditcheckresult = #{fcreditcheckresult}, fobjecttypeid = #{fobjecttypeid}, ftransferbiztype = #{ftransferbiztype}, fcorrespondorgid = #{fcorrespondorgid}, freccontactid = #{freccontactid}, fisinterlegalperson = #{fisinterlegalperson}, fplanrecaddress = #{fplanrecaddress}, fistotalserviceorcost = #{fistotalserviceorcost}, tc_erp_code = #{tcErpCode}, tc_erp_add_time = to_date(#{tcErpAddTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_status = #{tcSyncStatus}, tc_sync_msg = #{tcSyncMsg}, tc_sync_save_time = to_date(#{tcSyncSaveTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_submit_time = to_date(#{tcSyncSubmitTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), tc_sync_audit_time = to_date(#{tcSyncAuditTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where tc_define_rowid = #{tcDefineRowid}
mapper.sql: t.fid, t.fbilltypeid, t.fbillno, t.fdate, t.fcustomerid, t.fstockorgid, t.fdeliverydeptid, t.fstockergroupid, t.fstockerid, t.freceiverid, t.fsettleid, t.fpayerid, t.fsaleorgid, t.fsaledeptid, t.fsalesgroupid, t.fsalesmanid, t.fdeliverybill, t.ftakedeliverybill, t.fcarrierid, t.fcarriageno, t.fdocumentstatus, t.fnote, t.fcreatorid, t.fcreatedate, t.fmodifierid, t.fmodifydate, t.fapproverid, t.fapprovedate, t.fcancelstatus, t.fcancellerid, t.fcanceldate, t.fownertypeid, t.fownerid, t.fheadlocid, t.fheadlocaddress, t.fheadlocationid, t.fbusinesstype, t.freceiveaddress, t.fcreditcheckresult, t.fobjecttypeid, t.ftransferbiztype, t.fcorrespondorgid, t.freccontactid, t.fisinterlegalperson, t.fplanrecaddress, t.fistotalserviceorcost, t.tc_define_rowid, t.tc_erp_code, to_char(t.tc_erp_add_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_erp_add_time, t.tc_sync_status, t.tc_sync_msg, to_char(t.tc_sync_save_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_save_time, to_char(t.tc_sync_submit_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_submit_time, to_char(t.tc_sync_audit_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') tc_sync_audit_time

t1.fentryid, t1.fid as t1_fid, t1.fcustmatname, t1.fcustmatid, t1.fseq, t1.fmaterialid, t1.funitid, t1.fauxpropid, t1.fmustqty, t1.frealqty, t1.fstockid, t1.fstocklocid, t1.fstockstatusid, t1.flot, t1.flot_text, t1.fgrossweight, t1.fnetweight, t1.fbaseunitid, t1.fbaseunitqty, t1.fauxunitid, t1.fauxunitqty, t1.fextauxunitid, t1.fextauxunitqty, t1.fbomid, t1.fnote as t1_fnote, t1.fstockflag, t1.fownertypeid as t1_fownertypeid, t1.fownerid as t1_fownerid, t1.fkeepertypeid, t1.fkeeperid, t1.fproducedate, t1.fexpirydate, t1.fbasemustqty, t1.farrivalstatus, t1.farrivaldate, t1.farrivalconfirmor, t1.frepairqty, t1.frefuseqty, t1.fwantretqty, t1.factqty, t1.fisrepair, t1.fvalidatestatus, t1.fvalidatedate, t1.fvalidateconfirmor, t1.fbflowid, t1.fmtono, t1.fprojectno, t1.frecnote, t1.freturnnote, t1.fsnunitid, t1.fsnqty, t1.foutcontrol, t1.tc_define_rowid as t1_tc_define_rowid

choose.otherwise:
select tt.* from ( select from tb_k3_sal_outstock t
) tt
